post.body: your tweeted seesmic notifications link back to the old seesmic for now, as new.seesmic is still in beta and experimental
please don't mention the Clue Train peado's in public, Mitch. We don't want to spook them :P
can you tell me more about the "Link Twitter FAIL w/ password" problem you are having with Seesmic? I work on it, want to fix!
welcome to being a blogebrity. At least you don't get them in the comments of random blog posts.
vermin media! ha, you don't want to be with those fuckers and their deep level packet inspection anyway. No one inspects my packet!
I always knew you were into a bit of self-love! j/k
and you too! Great seeing you!
hey man rock NYC over NYE for me! Let's get together with @thomasknoll when u is back!
so are we... we're at the Marriott watching the cars in the blackout too
I read it in the Hawaiin Star Bulletin newspaper but the same article is covered in The (London) Times: http://is.gd/dCHJ
hey man, hope ur xmas was good with da mrs. Yeah man - having a shit xmas due to family issues with my bro. Defo we'll hang
merry xmas! Weather in Hawaii is lovely! Not really a water person (I don't swim!).
OMG there is going to be a movie about Second Life. :/
Time to get up and on with the day. Feeling quite refreshed for someone who has only had 4hrs sleep.
Burning the midnight oil. And the 1am. and the 2am oil too. Wish I was as productive, it's taking some time to get the juices flowing.
"There's nothing wrong with a little shooting as long as the right person gets shot" poster put up in unfortunate place http://is.gd/c6iT
O'Reilly just sent me a newsletter out of the blue called "Breaking News and Commentary" that has no breaking news in it. odd
Can we stop saying "econolypse". I end up reading it as "prolapse", which perhaps isn't entirely incorrect on so many levels...
Every Tue at 12pm they test the SF disaster siren. But I have no idea what it would be used for or what Im supposed to do it if it goes off.
You shouldn't laugh, but: One of America's leading anti-kidnapping experts has been, er, kidnapped in Mexico.
Listening to Estelle/American Boy and it reminded of a funny story I can't tweet sadly. But it made me smile for the first time in a while.
me thinks that scheduling certain tech events on the same night of (this) week isn't v community orientated, and smells a bit iffy.
Landed at SFO, no hassles at immigration, now waiting to get home!
OMG some stinky person just walked past me as they boaded. Fortunately they are at the back of the plane. Ewww!
Sitting on my LHR>SFO plane, waiting to leave, reading @rk's tweet that it is hailing in SF :(
Wishing I was at the @LaughingSquid party - have fun peeps!
Local radio says power could be out for 12hrs+. Oh boy, that totally f***s up an already crappy vacation :( #hipower
All the lights are out in Waikiki. V odd
Wondering the reason behind the sudden influx of erotic authors, sex writers, etc (unknown to me) friending me on twitter and flickr.
Chuffed that @iancr is following me! Him be v smart. Also, he gave me a lift to the first BarCampLA. He prob doesn't remember, but thanks!
Reading about 'biohackers' - amateurs who do genetic engineering work in their garages. V cool.
So sad, but at 8:15pm I'm calling it a night. Ta ta
In and amongst the lovely setting of Hawaii, having the most shittiest christmas you could imagine. This trip will be over soon thank god...
At Christmas breakfast
Waiting for 22 or 23 bus at Kahala Mall, to travel back to Waikiki. Merry Xmas everyone in UK
Thinking about a number of my insecurities in my personal and professional life. And coming to the conclusion many are probably legitimate.
Now following @TaylorBarr! Hey mate, glad we connected on Twitter!
Aloha @hawaii (Ryan)! We are here until 28th - would love to have a tweetup with local folks while we are here! We're in sunny Waikki! :)
Wondering if @amywalgenbach will start tweeting?
Looks like a guy called "gideon" left his bible in our hotel room.
